# elementDeclaration(forName:)

**Instance Method**

Returns the DTD node representing an element declaration for a specified element.

## Declaration

```swift
func elementDeclaration(forName name: String) -> XMLDTDNode?
```

## Parameters

- **name**: A string that is the name of an element.

## Return Value

An autoreleased [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/XMLDTDNode] object, or `nil` if there is no match.

## Getting DTD Nodes by Name

- **predefinedEntityDeclaration(forName:)**: Returns a DTD node representing the predefined entity declaration with the specified name.
- **attributeDeclaration(forName:elementName:)**: Returns the DTD node representing an attribute-list declaration for a given attribute and its element.
- **entityDeclaration(forName:)**: Returns the DTD node representing the entity declaration for a specified entity.
- **notationDeclaration(forName:)**: Returns the DTD node representing the notation declaration identified by the specified notation name.

items.description: Returns a DTD node representing the predefined entity declaration with the specified name.
items.name: predefinedEntityDeclaration(forName:)
